                                                <div data-target="readme-toc.content" class="Box-body px-5 pb-5">
                                                    <article class="markdown-body entry-content container-lg" itemprop="text"><h1 tabindex="-1" dir="auto"><a id="user-content-css-inline" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#css-inline"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>css-inline</h1>
                                                        <p dir="auto"><a href="https://github.com/Stranger6667/css-inline/actions/workflows/build.yml"><img alt="build status" src="https://camo.githubusercontent." height="20" data-canonical-src="https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/Stranger6667/css-inline/build.yml?style=flat-square&labelColor=555555&logo=github" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
                                                            <a href="https://crates.io/crates/css-inline" rel="nofollow"><img alt="crates.io" src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/a0a33c8f2a1125a689f92728de3eeef44b839c6726a837d682435e92cb3cc965/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f6372617465732f762f6373732d696e6c696e652e7376673f7374796c653d666c61742d73717561726526636f6c6f723d666338643632266c6f676f3d72757374" height="20" data-canonical-src="https://img.shields.io/crates/v/css-inline.svg?style=flat-square&color=fc8d62&logo=rust" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
                                                            <a href="https://docs.rs/css-inline" rel="nofollow"><img alt="docs.rs" src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/a3f7d6cadf61cff25557c15cb02b9fd355ebd3d5b4cb296b30dd59d4a4a12034/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f62616467652f646f63732e72732d6373735f696e6c696e652d3636633261353f7374796c653d666c61742d737175617265266c6162656c436f6c6f723d353535353535266c6f676f3d646f63732e7273" height="20" data-canonical-src="https://img.shields.io/badge/docs.rs-css_inline-66c2a5?style=flat-square&labelColor=555555&logo=docs.rs" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
                                                            <a href="https://app.codecov.io/github/Stranger6667/css-inline" rel="nofollow"><img alt="codecov.io" src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/fa1550e1639db7ab91a38cab1e61629507d599a937895e344f1705cde7a82a19/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f636f6465636f762f632f67682f537472616e676572363636372f6373732d696e6c696e653f6c6f676f3d636f6465636f76267374796c653d666c61742d73717561726526746f6b656e3d744f7a7656346b445930" height="20" data-canonical-src="https://img.shields.io/codecov/c/gh/Stranger6667/css-inline?logo=codecov&style=flat-square&token=tOzvV4kDY0" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
                                                            <a href="https://gitter.im/Stranger6667/css-inline" rel="nofollow"><img alt="gitter" src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/a7f40186416056d62d47e11eb12c503f2975a893a7ba6ce4854a256fa092ef87/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f6769747465722f726f6f6d2f537472616e676572363636372f6373732d696e6c696e653f7374796c653d666c61742d737175617265" height="20" data-canonical-src="https://img.shields.io/gitter/room/Stranger6667/css-inline?style=flat-square" style="max-width: 100%;"></a></p>
                                                        <p dir="auto"><code>css_inline</code> is a high-performance library for inlining CSS into HTML 'style' attributes.</p>
                                                        <p dir="auto">This library is designed for scenarios such as preparing HTML emails or embedding HTML into third-party web pages.</p>
                                                        <p dir="auto">For instance, the crate transforms HTML like this:</p>
                                                        <div class="highlight highlight-text-html-basic notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="<html>
    <head>
        <style>h1 { color:blue; }</style>
    </head>
    <body>
        <h1>Big Text</h1>
    </body>
</html>"><pre><span class="pl-kos"><</span><span class="pl-ent">html</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
    <span class="pl-kos"><</span><span class="pl-ent">head</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
        <span class="pl-kos"><</span><span class="pl-ent">style</span><span class="pl-kos">></span><span class="pl-ent">h1</span> { <span class="pl-c1">color</span><span class="pl-kos">:</span>blue; }<span class="pl-kos"></</span><span class="pl-ent">style</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
    <span class="pl-kos"></</span><span class="pl-ent">head</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
    <span class="pl-kos"><</span><span class="pl-ent">body</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
        <span class="pl-kos"><</span><span class="pl-ent">h1</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>Big Text<span class="pl-kos"></</span><span class="pl-ent">h1</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
    <span class="pl-kos"></</span><span class="pl-ent">body</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
<span class="pl-kos"></</span><span class="pl-ent">html</span><span class="pl-kos">></span></pre></div>
                                                        <p dir="auto">into:</p>
                                                        <div class="highlight highlight-text-html-basic notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="<html>
    <head></head>
    <body>
        <h1 style="color:blue;">Big Text</h1>
    </body>
</html>"><pre><span class="pl-kos"><</span><span class="pl-ent">html</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
    <span class="pl-kos"><</span><span class="pl-ent">head</span><span class="pl-kos">></span><span class="pl-kos"></</span><span class="pl-ent">head</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
    <span class="pl-kos"><</span><span class="pl-ent">body</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
        <span class="pl-kos"><</span><span class="pl-ent">h1</span> <span class="pl-c1">style</span>="<span class="pl-s">color:blue;</span>"<span class="pl-kos">></span>Big Text<span class="pl-kos"></</span><span class="pl-ent">h1</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
    <span class="pl-kos"></</span><span class="pl-ent">body</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
<span class="pl-kos"></</span><span class="pl-ent">html</span><span class="pl-kos">></span></pre></div>
                                                        <ul dir="auto">
                                                            <li>Uses reliable components from Mozilla's Servo project</li>
                                                            <li>Inlines CSS from <code>style</code> and <code>link</code> tags</li>
                                                            <li>Removes <code>style</code> and <code>link</code> tags</li>
                                                            <li>Resolves external stylesheets (including local files)</li>
                                                            <li>Works on Linux, Windows, and macOS</li>
                                                            <li>Supports HTML5 & CSS3</li>
                                                        </ul>
                                                        <h2 tabindex="-1" dir="auto"><a id="user-content-installation" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#installation"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>Installation</h2>
                                                        <p dir="auto">To include it in your project, add the following line to the dependencies section in your project's <code>Cargo.toml</code> file:</p>
                                                        <div class="highlight highlight-source-toml notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="[dependencies]
css-inline = "0.10""><pre>[<span class="pl-en">dependencies</span>]
<span class="pl-smi">css-inline</span> = <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>0.10<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span></pre></div>
                                                        <p dir="auto">The Minimum Supported Rust Version is 1.60.</p>
                                                        <h2 tabindex="-1" dir="auto"><a id="user-content-usage" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#usage"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>Usage</h2>
                                                        <div class="highlight highlight-source-rust notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="const HTML: &str = r#"<html>
<head>
    <style>h1 { color:blue; }</style>
</head>
<body>
    <h1>Big Text</h1>
</body>
</html>"#;

fn main() -> Result<(), css_inline::InlineError> {
    let inlined = css_inline::inline(HTML)?;
    // Do something with inlined HTML, e.g. send an email
    Ok(())
}"><pre><span class="pl-k">const</span> <span class="pl-v">HTML</span><span class="pl-kos">:</span> <span class="pl-c1">&</span><span class="pl-smi">str</span> = <span class="pl-s">r#"<html></span>
<span class="pl-s"><head></span>
<span class="pl-s">    <style>h1 { color:blue; }</style></span>
<span class="pl-s"></head></span>
<span class="pl-s"><body></span>
<span class="pl-s">    <h1>Big Text</h1></span>
<span class="pl-s"></body></span>
<span class="pl-s"></html>"#</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>

<span class="pl-k">fn</span> <span class="pl-en">main</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span> -> <span class="pl-smi">Result</span><span class="pl-kos"><</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span> css_inline<span class="pl-kos">::</span><span class="pl-smi">InlineError</span><span class="pl-kos">></span> <span class="pl-kos">{</span>
    <span class="pl-k">let</span> inlined = css_inline<span class="pl-kos">::</span><span class="pl-en">inline</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-v">HTML</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span>?<span class="pl-kos">;</span>
    <span class="pl-c">// Do something with inlined HTML, e.g. send an email</span>
    <span class="pl-v">Ok</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span>
<span class="pl-kos">}</span></pre></div>
                                                        <h3 tabindex="-1" dir="auto"><a id="user-content-configuration" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#configuration"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>Configuration</h3>
                                                        <p dir="auto"><code>css-inline</code> can be configured by using <code>CSSInliner::options()</code> that implements the Builder pattern:</p>
                                                        <div class="highlight highlight-source-rust notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="const HTML: &str = "...";

fn main() -> Result<(), css_inline::InlineError> {
    let inliner = css_inline::CSSInliner::options()
        .load_remote_stylesheets(false)
        .build();
    let inlined = inliner.inline(HTML);
    // Do something with inlined HTML, e.g. send an email
    Ok(())
}"><pre><span class="pl-k">const</span> <span class="pl-v">HTML</span><span class="pl-kos">:</span> <span class="pl-c1">&</span><span class="pl-smi">str</span> = <span class="pl-s">"..."</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>

<span class="pl-k">fn</span> <span class="pl-en">main</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span> -> <span class="pl-smi">Result</span><span class="pl-kos"><</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span> css_inline<span class="pl-kos">::</span><span class="pl-smi">InlineError</span><span class="pl-kos">></span> <span class="pl-kos">{</span>
    <span class="pl-k">let</span> inliner = css_inline<span class="pl-kos">::</span><span class="pl-smi">CSSInliner</span><span class="pl-kos">::</span><span class="pl-en">options</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span>
        <span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">load_remote_stylesheets</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-c1">false</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span>
        <span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">build</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>
    <span class="pl-k">let</span> inlined = inliner<span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">inline</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-v">HTML</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>
    <span class="pl-c">// Do something with inlined HTML, e.g. send an email</span>
    <span class="pl-v">Ok</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span>
<span class="pl-kos">}</span></pre></div>
                                                        <ul dir="auto">
                                                            <li><code>keep_style_tags</code>. Specifies whether to keep "style" tags after inlining. Default: <code>false</code></li>
                                                            <li><code>keep_link_tags</code>. Specifies whether to keep "link" tags after inlining. Default: <code>false</code></li>
                                                            <li><code>base_url</code>. The base URL used to resolve relative URLs. If you'd like to load stylesheets from your filesystem, use the <code>file://</code> scheme. Default: <code>None</code></li>
                                                            <li><code>load_remote_stylesheets</code>. Specifies whether remote stylesheets should be loaded. Default: <code>true</code></li>
                                                            <li><code>extra_css</code>. Extra CSS to be inlined. Default: <code>None</code></li>
                                                            <li><code>preallocate_node_capacity</code>. <strong>Advanced</strong>. Preallocates capacity for HTML nodes during parsing. This can improve performance when you have an estimate of the number of nodes in your HTML document. Default: <code>32</code></li>
                                                        </ul>
                                                        <p dir="auto">You can also skip CSS inlining for an HTML tag by adding the <code>data-css-inline="ignore"</code> attribute to it:</p>
                                                        <div class="highlight highlight-text-html-basic notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="<head>
    <style>h1 { color:blue; }</style>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- The tag below won't receive additional styles -->
    <h1 data-css-inline="ignore">Big Text</h1>
</body>"><pre><span class="pl-kos"><</span><span class="pl-ent">head</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
    <span class="pl-kos"><</span><span class="pl-ent">style</span><span class="pl-kos">></span><span class="pl-ent">h1</span> { <span class="pl-c1">color</span><span class="pl-kos">:</span>blue; }<span class="pl-kos"></</span><span class="pl-ent">style</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
<span class="pl-kos"></</span><span class="pl-ent">head</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
<span class="pl-kos"><</span><span class="pl-ent">body</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
    <span class="pl-c"><!-- The tag below won't receive additional styles --></span>
    <span class="pl-kos"><</span><span class="pl-ent">h1</span> <span class="pl-c1">data-css-inline</span>="<span class="pl-s">ignore</span>"<span class="pl-kos">></span>Big Text<span class="pl-kos"></</span><span class="pl-ent">h1</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
<span class="pl-kos"></</span><span class="pl-ent">body</span><span class="pl-kos">></span></pre></div>
                                                        <p dir="auto">The <code>data-css-inline="ignore"</code> attribute also allows you to skip <code>link</code> and <code>style</code> tags:</p>
                                                        <div class="highlight highlight-text-html-basic notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="<head>
    <!-- Styles below are ignored -->
    <style data-css-inline="ignore">h1 { color:blue; }</style>
</head>
<body>
    <h1>Big Text</h1>
</body>"><pre><span class="pl-kos"><</span><span class="pl-ent">head</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
    <span class="pl-c"><!-- Styles below are ignored --></span>
    <span class="pl-kos"><</span><span class="pl-ent">style</span> <span class="pl-c1">data-css-inline</span>="<span class="pl-s">ignore</span>"<span class="pl-kos">></span><span class="pl-ent">h1</span> { <span class="pl-c1">color</span><span class="pl-kos">:</span>blue; }<span class="pl-kos"></</span><span class="pl-ent">style</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
<span class="pl-kos"></</span><span class="pl-ent">head</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
<span class="pl-kos"><</span><span class="pl-ent">body</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
    <span class="pl-kos"><</span><span class="pl-ent">h1</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>Big Text<span class="pl-kos"></</span><span class="pl-ent">h1</span><span class="pl-kos">></span>
<span class="pl-kos"></</span><span class="pl-ent">body</span><span class="pl-kos">></span></pre></div>
                                                        <p dir="auto">If you'd like to load stylesheets from your filesystem, use the <code>file://</code> scheme:</p>
                                                        <div class="highlight highlight-source-rust notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="const HTML: &str = "...";

fn main() -> Result<(), css_inline::InlineError> {
    let base_url = css_inline::Url::parse("file://styles/email/").expect("Invalid URL");
    let inliner = css_inline::CSSInliner::options()
        .base_url(Some(base_url))
        .build();
    let inlined = inliner.inline(HTML);
    // Do something with inlined HTML, e.g. send an email
    Ok(())
}"><pre><span class="pl-k">const</span> <span class="pl-v">HTML</span><span class="pl-kos">:</span> <span class="pl-c1">&</span><span class="pl-smi">str</span> = <span class="pl-s">"..."</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>

<span class="pl-k">fn</span> <span class="pl-en">main</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span> -> <span class="pl-smi">Result</span><span class="pl-kos"><</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span> css_inline<span class="pl-kos">::</span><span class="pl-smi">InlineError</span><span class="pl-kos">></span> <span class="pl-kos">{</span>
    <span class="pl-k">let</span> base_url = css_inline<span class="pl-kos">::</span><span class="pl-smi">Url</span><span class="pl-kos">::</span><span class="pl-en">parse</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-s">"file://styles/email/"</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">expect</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-s">"Invalid URL"</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>
    <span class="pl-k">let</span> inliner = css_inline<span class="pl-kos">::</span><span class="pl-smi">CSSInliner</span><span class="pl-kos">::</span><span class="pl-en">options</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span>
        <span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">base_url</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-v">Some</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span>base_url<span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span>
        <span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">build</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>
    <span class="pl-k">let</span> inlined = inliner<span class="pl-kos">.</span><span class="pl-en">inline</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-v">HTML</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">;</span>
    <span class="pl-c">// Do something with inlined HTML, e.g. send an email</span>
    <span class="pl-v">Ok</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span><span class="pl-kos">)</span>
<span class="pl-kos">}</span></pre></div>
                                                        <h2 tabindex="-1" dir="auto"><a id="user-content-performance" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#performance"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>Performance</h2>
                                                        <p dir="auto"><code>css-inline</code> typically inlines HTML emails within hundreds of microseconds, though results may vary with input complexity.</p>
                                                        <p dir="auto">Benchmarks for <code>css-inline==0.10.4</code>:</p>
                                                        <ul dir="auto">
                                                            <li>Basic: <strong>7.13 s</strong></li>
                                                            <li>Realistic-1: <strong>152.95 s</strong></li>
                                                            <li>Realistic-2: <strong>110.82 s</strong></li>
                                                        </ul>
                                                        <p dir="auto">These benchmarks, conducted using <code>rustc 1.71.1</code>, can be found in <code>css-inline/benches/inliner.rs</code>.</p>
                                                        <h2 tabindex="-1" dir="auto"><a id="user-content-bindings" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#bindings"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>Bindings</h2>
                                                        <p dir="auto"><code>css-inline</code> is primarily a Rust library, but we also provide bindings for several other languages:</p>
                                                        <ul dir="auto">
                                                            <li><a href="https://github.com/Stranger6667/css-inline/tree/master/bindings/c">C</a></li>
                                                            <li><a href="https://github.com/Stranger6667/css-inline/tree/master/bindings/python">Python</a></li>
                                                            <li><a href="https://github.com/Stranger6667/css-inline/tree/master/bindings/ruby">Ruby</a></li>
                                                            <li><a href="https://github.com/Stranger6667/css-inline/tree/master/bindings/wasm">WebAssembly</a></li>
                                                        </ul>
                                                        <h2 tabindex="-1" dir="auto"><a id="user-content-command-line-interface" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#command-line-interface"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>Command Line Interface</h2>
                                                        <h3 tabindex="-1" dir="auto"><a id="user-content-installation-1" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#installation-1"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>Installation</h3>
                                                        <p dir="auto">Install with <code>cargo</code>:</p>
                                                        <div class="snippet-clipboard-content notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="cargo install css-inline"><pre lang="text" class="notranslate"><code>cargo install css-inline
</code></pre></div>
                                                        <h3 tabindex="-1" dir="auto"><a id="user-content-usage-1" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#usage-1"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>Usage</h3>
                                                        <p dir="auto">The following command inlines CSS in multiple documents in parallel. Resulting files will be saved
                                                            as <code>inlined.email1.html</code> and <code>inlined.email2.html</code>:</p>
                                                        <div class="snippet-clipboard-content notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="css-inline email1.html email2.html"><pre lang="text" class="notranslate"><code>css-inline email1.html email2.html
</code></pre></div>
                                                        <p dir="auto">For full details of the options available, you can use the <code>--help</code> flag:</p>
                                                        <div class="snippet-clipboard-content notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="css-inline --help"><pre lang="text" class="notranslate"><code>css-inline --help
</code></pre></div>
                                                        <h2 tabindex="-1" dir="auto"><a id="user-content-further-reading" class="anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#further-reading"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>Further reading</h2>
                                                        <p dir="auto">If you're interested in learning how this library was created and how it works internally, check out these articles:</p>
